tool_description: Estimates the approximate date of word formation, borrowing, or semantic change based on historical linguistic evidence and comparative data.

word.description: The word for which to estimate etymological dates

language.description: ISO 639-1 language code of the word

etymology_data.description: Array of etymological information and ancestral forms

historical_citations.description: Array of historical citations with dates

estimation_method.description: Method for date estimation: comparative, attestation_based, sound_change, combined

error_messages: Invalid language code: Provide a valid ISO 639-1 language code.
Insufficient etymology data: Provide at least one piece of etymological information.
Invalid estimation method: Use one of [comparative, attestation_based, sound_change, combined].
Inconsistent date evidence: The provided citations contain conflicting date information.
Word not found: The specified word cannot be located in etymological databases.
usage: Provide word, language, and etymology_data array. Optionally include historical_citations and specify estimation_method for date calculation approach.

estimated_formation_date.description: Estimated date or date range when the word was formed

confidence_level.description: Confidence score (0-1) for the date estimation

dating_evidence.description: Types of evidence used for dating estimation

uncertainty_range.description: Uncertainty range around the estimated date
